short.ar: خذ المرضى إلى مستشفى الطوارئ في لعبة الإسعاف هذه.
short.am: በዚህ የአምቡላንስ ጨዋታ የታመሙ ሰዎችን ወደ ድንገተኛ ሆስፒታል ይውሰዱ።
short.bg: Вземете болни хора в спешна болница в тази линейка игра.
short.bn: এই অ্যাম্বুলেন্স গেমটিতে অসুস্থ ব্যক্তিদের জরুরি হাসপাতালে নিয়ে যান।
short.ca: Porteu persones malaltes a l'hospital d'emergència en aquest joc d'ambulàncies.
short.cs: Vezměte nemocné lidi do pohotovostní nemocnice v této sanitní hře.
short.da: Tag syge mennesker til akuthospitalet i dette ambulancespil.
short.de: Bringen Sie kranke Menschen in diesem Ambulanzspiel in ein Notfallkrankenhaus.
short.el: Πάρτε άρρωστους ανθρώπους στο νοσοκομείο έκτακτης ανάγκης σε αυτό το παιχνίδι ασθενοφόρων.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Take ill people to emergency hospital in this ambulance game.
short.es: Lleve a los enfermos al hospital de emergencia en este juego de ambulancia.
short.et: Viige haiged selles kiirabimängus erakorralise meditsiini haiglasse.
short.fa: در این بازی آمبولانس افراد بیمار را به بیمارستان اورژانس ببر.
short.fi: Vie sairaat ihmiset hätäsairaalaan tässä ambulanssipelissä.
short.fil: Dalhin ang mga maysakit sa emergency hospital sa larong ito ng ambulansya.
short.fr: Emmenez les malades à l’hôpital d’urgence dans ce jeu d’ambulance.
short.gu: આ એમ્બ્યુલન્સની રમતમાં બીમાર લોકોને ઇમરજન્સી હોસ્પિટલમાં લઈ જાઓ.
short.he: קח אנשים חולים לבית חולים חירום במשחק האמבולנסים הזה.
short.hi: इस एम्बुलेंस गेम में बीमार लोगों को आपातकालीन अस्पताल ले जाएं।
short.hr: Odvedi bolesne ljude u hitnu bolnicu u ovoj igri hitne pomoći.
short.hu: Vigyen betegeket sürgősségi kórházba ebben a mentőjátékban.
short.id: Bawa orang sakit ke rumah sakit darurat dalam permainan ambulans ini.
short.it: Porta i malati al pronto soccorso in questo gioco di ambulanza.
short.ja: この救急車のゲームで病気の人を救急病院に連れて行ってください。
short.kn: ಈ ಆಂಬ್ಯುಲೆನ್ಸ್ ಆಟದಲ್ಲಿ ಅನಾರೋಗ್ಯ ಪೀಡಿತರನ್ನು ತುರ್ತು ಆಸ್ಪತ್ರೆಗೆ ಕರೆದೊಯ್ಯಿರಿ.
short.ko: 이 구급차 게임에서 아픈 사람들을 응급 병원으로 데려가십시오.
short.lv: Šajā ātrās palīdzības spēlē nogādājiet slimus cilvēkus neatliekamās palīdzības slimnīcā.
short.ml: ഈ ആംബുലൻസ് ഗെയിമിൽ രോഗികളെ എമർജൻസി ഹോസ്പിറ്റലിലേക്ക് കൊണ്ടുപോകുക.
short.mr: या रुग्णवाहिकेच्या खेळात आजारी लोकांना आपत्कालीन रुग्णालयात घेऊन जा.
short.ms: Ambil orang sakit ke hospital kecemasan dalam permainan ambulans ini.
short.nl: Breng zieke mensen naar het noodhospitaal in dit ambulancespel.
short.no: Ta syke mennesker til akuttsykehus i dette ambulansespillet.
short.pl: Zabierz chorych do szpitala ratunkowego w tej grze karetki.
short.ro: Duceți bolnavii la spitalul de urgență în acest joc de ambulanță.
short.ru: Ведите больных людей в больницу скорой помощи в этой игре скорой помощи.
short.sk: Vezmite chorých ľudí do pohotovostnej nemocnice v tejto hre so sanitkou.
short.sl: Odpeljite bolne ljudi v urgentno bolnišnico v tej reševalni igri.
short.sv: Ta sjuka människor till akutsjukhus i detta ambulansspel.
short.sw: Kupeleka watu wagonjwa katika hospitali ya dharura katika mchezo huu wa gari la wagonjwa.
short.ta: இந்த ஆம்புலன்ஸ் விளையாட்டில் நோய்வாய்ப்பட்டவர்களை அவசர மருத்துவமனைக்கு அழைத்துச் செல்லுங்கள்.
short.te: ఈ అంబులెన్స్ గేమ్ లో అస్వస్థతకు గురైన వారిని అత్యవసర ఆసుపత్రికి తీసుకెళ్లండి.
short.th: พาคนป่วยไปโรงพยาบาลฉุกเฉินในเกมรถพยาบาลนี้
short.tr: Bu ambulans oyununda hasta insanları acil hastaneye götürün.
short.uk: Відвезіть хворих людей до лікарні швидкої допомоги в цій грі швидкої допомоги.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While driving in the city with the ambulance, you have to go to the emergency accidents you see on the road and take the patients to the hospital as soon as possible with the help of an ambulance without any harm. Since there is car traffic in the city, you can turn on the ambulance siren and pass between the other cars. In this way, you can reach the emergency hospital in a shorter time. Be careful not to shake the ambulance while the patient is in the vehicle, and be a good ambulance driver. The well-being of patients depends on your driving ability.

People spend most of their time in daily life playing games. One of the most well-known games among these games is the ambulance game. This car driving game is designed as an ambulance game that can increase one's attention and abilities. The game type has been developed to be emergency. Many topics are covered here. Ambulance drivers are given tasks according to their abilities. One of the essential skills is ambulance car driving. These vehicles are specially designed and serve sick people.

You will enjoy this game, which has a different concept from Ambulance games. Become a good driver in this ambulance game and own a good ambulance car with the rewards you earn. A better ambulance car will allow you to enjoy the ambulance profession more. While the patients are waiting for you in a difficult situation, you need to reach the patients very quickly with the help of an ambulance among the cars in the city.

How To Play
It is played with arrow keys and mouse.

City Ambulance Car Driving Game Features
✓ Realistic shader
✓ Advanced car control
✓ 3D level designer
✓ 3D environment

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
